Package implementations

Class MyDLL<E>

java.lang.Object
implementations.MyDLL<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the type of elements in this list
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, utilities.ListADT<E>
public class MyDLL<E> extends Object implements utilities.ListADT<E>
A doubly linked list implementation of the ListADT interface. This class provides methods for adding, removing, retrieving, and manipulating elements in a doubly linked list structure.
See Also:
